name: dagu
description: Dagu is a CSV-based task runner and scheduler that simplifies batch job orchestration with a web UI. It supports workflows, logs, retryable tasks, and file-based configurations for lightweight self-hosted setups.
features: File-Based Config: Define workflows in simple CSV files. No database required.
Web Interface: Monitor and control jobs through browser. Visual workflow management.
Retry Logic: Automatic retries for failed tasks. Resilient job execution.
Workflow Support: Chain tasks with dependencies. Complex orchestration made simple.
Execution Logs: Detailed history of all job runs. Full visibility and debugging.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage for efficient operation. Perfect for any server.
